trans-unit.source: Register your Mobile App backend with your Azure Active Directory tenant by following the [How to configure your Mobile App with Azure Active Directory] topic.
trans-unit.target: Register your Mobile App backend with your Azure Active Directory tenant by following the [How to configure your Mobile App with Azure Active Directory] topic.

trans-unit.source: Navigate to **Active Directory** in the [Azure Management Portal]
trans-unit.target: Navigate to **Active Directory** in the [Azure Management Portal]

trans-unit.source: Select your directory, and then select the **Applications** tab at the top.
trans-unit.target: Select your directory, and then select the **Applications** tab at the top.

trans-unit.source: Click **ADD** at the bottom to create a new app registration.
trans-unit.target: Click **ADD** at the bottom to create a new app registration.

trans-unit.source: Click **Add an application my organization is developing**.
trans-unit.target: Click **Add an application my organization is developing**.

trans-unit.source: In the Add Application Wizard, enter a **Name** for your application and click the **Native Client Application** type.
trans-unit.target: In the Add Application Wizard, enter a **Name** for your application and click the **Native Client Application** type.

trans-unit.source: In the **Redirect URI** box, enter the /login/done endpoint for your App Service gateway.
trans-unit.target: In the **Redirect URI** box, enter the /login/done endpoint for your App Service gateway.

trans-unit.source: This value should be similar to https://contoso.azurewebsites.net/login/done.
trans-unit.target: This value should be similar to https://contoso.azurewebsites.net/login/done.

trans-unit.source: Once the native application has been added, click the **Configure** tab.
trans-unit.target: Once the native application has been added, click the **Configure** tab.

trans-unit.source: Scroll the page down to the **permissions to other applications** section and click **Add application**.
trans-unit.target: Scroll the page down to the **permissions to other applications** section and click **Add application**.

trans-unit.source: Search for the web application that you registered earlier and click the plus icon.
trans-unit.target: Search for the web application that you registered earlier and click the plus icon.

trans-unit.source: Then click the check to close the dialog.
trans-unit.target: Then click the check to close the dialog.

trans-unit.source: On the new entry you just added, open the **Delegated Permissions** dropdown and select **Access (appName)**.
trans-unit.target: On the new entry you just added, open the **Delegated Permissions** dropdown and select **Access (appName)**.

trans-unit.source: Your application is now configured in AAD so that users can log in using AAD single sign-on.
trans-unit.target: Your application is now configured in AAD so that users can log in using AAD single sign-on.
